verbose_text: For example, lubricin mimetic, an extracellular matrix component structural analogue, attenuated OA progression [XREF_BIBR] whereas PG545, a heparan sulphate mimetic in cultured human OA chondrocytes, inhibited the effect of heparanase that is known to stimulate catabolic MMP13 and ADAMTS and downregulate aggrecan and type II collagen synthesis [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: lubricin mimetic, an extracellular matrix component structural analogue, attenuated OA
